bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. Combined Designation of the poison of mineral elixir medications. Their ingredients generally focus on cinnabar and mercury, as well as precious metals, and they are to be ingested following a chemical refinement process with the aim of achieving longevity. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 10: 用旋刺下羊血、雞鴨血熱服，兼解鼠莽毒及丹藥毒 , “Ingest the hot blood that has been taken from a lamb, chicken or duck immediately after it was pierced, and this will dissolve the poison of shu mang and elixir drug poison alike”.
